item.title: Workmen complete only half the job today 10/04/25., 10th April
item.description:
Small sink hole outside 24 alverton drive, bishops cleeve, cheltenham, glos ,GL52 8TD. the workmen only completed half the job today 10/04/2025. The edging stones have also sunk but these were just left as is and new tarmac added to top. extremely poor job. please come at redo everything including the edging.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alverton Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
